div.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/1660-4601/16/16/2970/s1, Figure S1: Schematic summary of main pathways by which climate change affects livelihoods, human wellbeing and health, and how they are related to the WEF nexus. The pathways formed the basis to develop a systems approach that integrates water, food, and energy aspects by mapping key elements of the subsystems and visualising their interdependencies.
